0100011111101001 0101000100111101 1 -> sum: 1001100100100111, cout: 0

0011001100111010 0010111100110110 0 -> sum: 0110001001110000, cout: 0
1000111111001011 1110011000001011 0 -> sum: 0111010111010110, cout: 1
1000000110101100 0011011000100000 0 -> sum: 1011011111001100, cout: 0
0010010111111110 1110011001111000 1 -> sum: 0000110001110111, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
